title: 'Seymour': A Loving Portrait Of An Acclaimed Classical Pianist
teaser: Seymour: An Introduction is an inspiring new documentary by the actor Ethan Hawke. It's about Seymour Bernstein, who quit a successful concert career at the age of 50 to become a piano teacher.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
